title: Product Catalog Cross- and Upselling
description:
Description
For an internal user
who wants to create a new mobile contract on behalf of the customer
the cross- and upselling support of the Product Catalog
Is a crucial capability in the sales process,
that finds and presents cross- or upselling-paths for the main products of the portfolio. The catalog must therefore know all the dependencies between the products. It must be easy to recognize when there are multiple “T-shirt” sizes available for a tariff. An update path must be stored for outdated products so that, in the best case scenario, a suitable offer from the latest generation is always offered. The compatibility of the accessories should be stored for mobile devices.
Unlike todays solution like BSP or CARMEN
our solution contains information about which products can be combined with each other. The purpose of this information is to encourage the customer to select a higher quality version of their original product selection or additional products.
